element.name: Who Provided CPR Prior to EMS Arrival
element.definition: Documentation of who performed CPR prior to this EMS unit's arrival.
element.v3Comment:
Associated with eArrest.05 (CPR Care Provided Prior to EMS Arrival) but only required if CPR was provided prior to EMS arrival.
This element is a component of the Utstein Cardiac Arrest Criteria as identified in the American Heart Association journal "Resuscitation" from 2004 entitled "Cardiac Arrest and Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Outcome Reports". http://circ.ahajournals.org/cgi/content/full/110/21/3385

choice.description: Other EMS Professional (not part of dispatched response)
